title: Unable to Connect to the login queue
body:
I tried logging into LOL 2 days ago and after a long pause of it "Authenticating" an error comes up saying "Unable to connect to the login queue".  I've been playing LOL off and on for about 2 years now and this has never happened before.   Tried reinstalling the game and still doesn't work.   

Anyone else having these problems?

replies.body: Im stuck in endless Authenticating aswell for the last hour

Same issue here on EUW for a few days now. Only that today I cant login at all..
- Flushing DNS doesnt not help
- repari does not help

HELP!?

~~Having issues login into the queue this afternoon as well.  I was able to login last night and nothing has changed on my machine since last night, so not sure what to do.~~

Nevermind, just got in.

It looks like we had a minor hiccup with the NA login servers just a bit ago. I've reached out to some of our techs and everything should be good to go at this point! The fix might take about 30 min to go into effect, but definitely let me know if you can't get logged in after after that!
Having the same problem at 12:00pm CST.
I tried to get on this morning but the same thing keeps happening.   Thanks for helping though!

> [{quoted}](name=Ace Rash,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=mXEIY5TG,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-07-16T13:31:23.484+0000)
>
> I tried to get on this morning but the same thing keeps happening.   Thanks for helping though!

I'm having the same problem.
